about_the_game:
Experience the first part of To Be A King's epic story, and embark on an exhilarating journey through the realm of power, ambition, and desire with the enticing demo of "To Be A King."

As an ordinary citizen thrust into the treacherous world of royalty, you must navigate a complex web of political intrigue, romantic entanglements, and personal dilemmas. Your decisions will shape your destiny, as you strive to rise above the challenges and become the ruler you were destined to be.

Will you seize the throne and rule with an iron fist, or will you become a benevolent leader, guiding your kingdom toward prosperity? The choice is yours. Experience the intrigue and sensuality of "To Be A King" and embark on a journey that will leave you longing for more.

content_descriptors.notes:
To Be A King contains mature language, nudity. It also contains graphic depictions of sexual activity, including oral, vaginal, and other sexual activity, including spanking. Occasional blood, gore, and violence, including with weapons, is also depicted.

All sexual situations depicted are consensual and between adults 18 years or older. 

This game has many adult situations and sensitive topics discussed, including alcohol use & sexual assault (discussed but never shown), and is suitable only for persons 18 or older.

detailed_description:
Experience the first part of To Be A King's epic story, and embark on an exhilarating journey through the realm of power, ambition, and desire with the enticing demo of "To Be A King."

As an ordinary citizen thrust into the treacherous world of royalty, you must navigate a complex web of political intrigue, romantic entanglements, and personal dilemmas. Your decisions will shape your destiny, as you strive to rise above the challenges and become the ruler you were destined to be.

Will you seize the throne and rule with an iron fist, or will you become a benevolent leader, guiding your kingdom toward prosperity? The choice is yours. Experience the intrigue and sensuality of "To Be A King" and embark on a journey that will leave you longing for more.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or Kernel 3.x+ distributions
  • Processor: 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: To Be A King - Volume 1 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or Higher
  • Processor: 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The demo offers the experience of the first part of the main game! Feel the taste of the drama, plots, and sexy empire ladies that await you! Which path will be yours? Many doors can open, but many can be closed based on your choices! Which type of King are you? A Savior or a fearsome ruler?
